This article includes miscellaneous installation issues that fit nowhere else.

### Ignore this warning

If you see this warning when installing fgeo packages you can safely ignore it ([details](https://github.com/eddelbuettel/drat/issues/46#issue-136833697)):

```R
Warning in install.packages :
  unable to access index for repository https://foresgeo.github.io/drat/...:
  cannot open URL 'https://foresgeo.github.io/drat/.../PACKAGES'
```

### Installation tests

__fgeo__ successfully installed on Windows, Mac and Linux with R 3.5:

* Local windows 10 x64, R 3.5.2.
* Ubuntu 14.04 (on travis-ci), R 3.5.1.
* Win-builder, R devel and release.

__fgeo__ also successfully installed on Linux with R 3.3:

* Ubuntu 16.04.5 (on rstudio.cloud), R 3.3.3.
